Description_lang: Anduin summons a $@spellname365293 that inflicts $365853s1 Twilight damage to all players and creates a barrier that persists for $365173d. $s3% of healing received by players within the area is redirected to the barrier. Up to $s1 healing received reduces the size of the barrier.Upon expiration, the barrier explodes and inflicts $365300s1 Twilight damage, tainting all players. This effect absorbs up to $s2 healing received based on the size of the Befouled Barrier.
AuraDescription_lang: $s3% of healing received is redirected to the$@spellname365293.
